Read this FASTA format alignment into R with the help of functions in the Bio3D package. Calculate a
sequence identity matrix (again using a function within the Bio3D package). T

```{r}
library(bio3d)
```


```{r}
alignment <- read.fasta("https://www.ebi.ac.uk/Tools/services/rest/muscle/result/muscle-I20220309-011541-0230-74212060-p1m/aln-fasta")
alignment
```


```{r}
idmatrix <- seqidentity(alignment2, normalize=TRUE, similarity=FALSE, ncore=1, nseg.scale=1)
idmatrix
```

```{r}
library(pheatmap)
pheatmap(idmatrix)
```

```{r}
smallalign <- read.fasta("https://www.ebi.ac.uk/Tools/services/rest/muscle/result/muscle-I20220310-220725-0235-23848655-p1m/aln-fasta")
```
